description: “On a scale of 1 to 10, how horny did you get on that hike?” We asked our newest muscle hunk, Ralph. “About an 11! I thought people were watching me the whole time and it just got me more and more turned on. I really love putting on a show.” When it came to talking about what he likes about sex, the list went on. Everything turns him on…even being tied up and dominated. “I usually take charge everywhere else in life. In the gym and home, I make the decisions, I decide what to do. When I get tied up by somebody, it’s exhilarating! It gives me a thrill that I can’t really get anywhere else.” He wasn’t lying about loving putting on a show for people - he couldn’t stop touching himself outside. When we headed back to the car, he just couldn’t wait until we got to the house, so he whipped out his dick and jerked it off right then and there. Hot and eager...we like it!
title: Ralph
